1L1o1n1g1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1 1i1t1 1b1e1c1a1m1e1 1a1n1 1a1r1c1h1a1i1c1,1 1f1i1l1t1h1y1,1 1p1r1o1f1l1i1g1a1t1e1 1s1y1m1b1o1l1 1o1f1 1e1v1e1r1y1t1h1i1n1g1 1w1r1o1n1g1 1w1i1t1h1 1o1u1r1 1b1r1o1k1e1n1 1c1i1t1i1e1s1,1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1s1u1b1w1a1y1 1w1a1s1 1a1 1m1a1r1v1e1l1 1‚1Ä1î1 1a1 1m1a1d1 1f1e1a1t1 1o1f1 1e1n1g1i1n2e1r1i1n1g1 1a1n1d1 1a1n1 1a1u1d1a1c1i1o1u1s1 1g1a1m1b1l1e1 1o1n1 1a1 1p1r1e1p1o1s1t1e1r1o1u1s1l1y1 1a1m1b1i1t1i1o1u1s1 1v1i1s1i1o1n1.1 1‚1Ä1ú1T1h1e1 1e2f1e1c1t1 1i1t1 1i1s1 1t1o1 1h1a1v1e1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1c1i1t1y1 1o1f1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1i1s1 1s1o1m1e1t1h1i1n1g1 1l1a1r1g1e1r1 1t1h1a1n1 1a1n1y1 1m1i1n1d1 1c1a1n1 1r1e1a1l1i1z1e1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1s1a1i1d1 1W1i2l1i1a1m1 1G1a1y1n1o1r1,1 1t1h1e1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1m1a1y1o1r1 1w1h1o1 1s1e1t1 1i1n1 1m1o1t1i1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1i1m1a1r1y1 1p1h1a1s1e1 1o1f1 1i1t1s1 1c1o1n1s1t1r1u1c1t1i1o1n1.1 1A1 1p1u1b1l1i1c1-1w1o1r1k1s1 1p1r1o1j1e1c1t1 1o1f1 1t1h1i1s1 1s1c1a1l1e1 1h1a1d1 1n1e1v1e1r1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1 1b2e1n1 1u1n1d1e1r1t1a1k1e1n1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1U1n1i1t1e1d1 1S1t1a1t1e1s1,1 1a1n1d1 1e1v1e1n1 1n1o1w1,1 1m1o1r1e1 1t1h1a1n1 1a1 1c1e1n1t1u1r1y1 1l1a1t1e1r1,1 1i1t1 1i1s1 1h1a1r1d1 1t1o1 1f1u2l1y1 1a2p1r1e1c1i1a1t1e1 1w1h1a1t1 1i1t1 1d1i1d1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1c1i1t1y1 1a1n1d1,1 1r1e1a2l1y1,1 1t1h1e1 1n1a1t1i1o1n1.

1B1e1f1o1r1e1 1t1h1e1 1s1u1b1w1a1y1,1 1i1t1 1w1a1s1 1b1y1 1n1o1 1m1e1a1n1s1 1a1 1f1o1r1e1g1o1n1e1 1c1o1n1c1l1u1s1i1o1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1b1e1c1o1m1e1 1t1h1e1 1g1r1e1a1t1e1s1t1 1c1i1t1y1 1o1n1 1e1a1r1t1h1.1 1H1u1n1d1r1e1d1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1o1u1s1a1n1d1s1 1o1f1 1i2m1i1g1r1a1n1t1s1 1f1l2e1i1n1g1 1p1o1v1e1r1t1y1 1a1n1d1 1p1e1r1s1e1c1u1t1i1o1n1 1w1e1r1e1 1a2r1i1v1i1n1g1 1o1n1 1i1t1s1 1d2o1r1s1t1e1p1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1y1e1a1r1,1 1b1u1t1 1m1o1s1t1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1m1 1w1e1r1e1 1e2f1e1c1t1i1v1e1l1y1 1m1a1r2o1n1e1d1,1 1h1e1r1d1e1d1 1i1n1t1o1 1d1a1r1k1,1 1s1q1u1a1l1i1d1 1t1e1n1e1m1e1n1t1s1 1i1n1 1d1i1s1e1a1s1e1-1r1i2d1e1n1 1s1l1u1m1s1.1 1T1h1e1 1f1i1v1e1 1b1o1r1o1u1g1h1s1 1h1a1d1 1r1e1c1e1n1t1l1y1 1b2e1n1 1j1o1i1n1e1d1 1a1s1 1o1n1e1 1c1i1t1y1,1 1b1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1f1a1r1m1s1 1a1n1d1 1v1i2l1a1g1e1s1 1o1f1 1B1r2o1k1l1y1n1,1 1t1h1e1 1B1r1o1n1x1 1a1n1d1 1Q1u2e1n1s1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1a1s1 1w1e2l1 1h1a1v1e1 1b2e1n1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1s1i1d1e1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1l1a1n1e1t1 1f1r1o1m1 1M1a1n1h1a2t1a1n1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1t2e1m1i1n1g1 1s1t1r2e1t1s1.1 1B1o1u1n1d1 1u1p1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1f1a1t1e1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1c1i1t1y1 1w1e1r1e1 1e1v1e1n1 1l1a1r1g1e1r1 1q1u1e1s1t1i1o1n1s1:1 1W1o1u1l1d1 1A1m1e1r1i1c1a1 1b1e1 1a1b1l1e1 1t1o1 1m1a1n1a1g1e1 1t1h1e1 1t1r1a1n1s1i1t1i1o1n1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1 1i1n1d1i1v1i1d1u1a1l1i1s1m1 1a1n1d1 1i1n1s1u1l1a1r1i1t1y1 1t1h1a1t1 1d1e1f1i1n1e1d1 1i1t1s1 11191t1h1-1c1e1n1t1u1r1y1 1f1r1o1n1t1i1e1r1s1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1c1r1e1a1t1i1v1e1 1c1o2l1a1b1o1r1a1t1i1o1n1 1a1n1d1 1c1o1m1p1e1t1i1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1i1t1s1 1f1a1s1t1-1g1r1o1w1i1n1g1 1u1r1b1a1n1 1c1e1n1t1e1r1s1?1 1C1o1u1l1d1 1i1t1 1a1d1a1p1t1 1a1n1d1 1e1x1c1e1l1 1i1n1 1t1h1i1s1 1r1a1p1i1d1l1y1 1c1h1a1n1g1i1n1g1 1w1o1r1l1d1?1 1W1e1r1e1 1c1i1t1i1e1s1 1t1h1e1 1p1a1s1t1 1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1f1u1t1u1r1e1 1o1f1 1c1i1v1i1l1i1z1a1t1i1o1n1?1 1A1n1d1 1t1h1e1n1 1c1a1m1e1 1t1h1e1 1s1u1b1w1a1y1:1 1h1u1n1d1r1e1d1s1 1o1f1 1m1i1l1e1s1 1o1f1 1t1r1a1c1k1 1s1h2o1t1i1n1g1 1o1u1t1 1i1n1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1d1i1r1e1c1t1i1o1n1,1 1c1a2r1y1i1n1g1 1m1i2l1i1o1n1s1 1o1f1 1i2m1i1g1r1a1n1t1s1 1o1u1t1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1g1h1e2t1o1s1 1a1n1d1 1i1n1t1o1 1n1e1w1l1y1 1b1u1i1l1t1 1h1o1m1e1s1,1 1t1y1i1n1g1 1t1o1g1e1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1d1e1r1n1 1c1i1t1y1 1a1n1d1 1e1n1a1b1l1i1n1g1 1i1t1 1t1o1 1b1e1c1o1m1e1 1a1 1p1l1a1c1e1 1w1h1e1r1e1 1a1n1y1t1h1i1n1g1 1w1a1s1 1p1o2s1i1b1l1e1.

1B1a1l1a1d1e1 1B1u1r1k1s1,1 1a1n1 1M1.1T1.1A1.1 1e1m1p1l1o1y2e1,1 1a1t1 1w1o1r1k1 1i1n1 1a1 1s1u1b1w1a1y1 1c1o1n1t1r1o1l1 1t1o1w1e1r1 1i1n1 1B1r2o1k1l1y1n1.
1C1r1e1d1i1t1 1D1a1m1o1n1 1W1i1n1t1e1r1/1T1h1e1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1T1i1m1e1s
1I1t1 1w1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1a2r1i1v1a1l1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1s1u1b1w1a1y1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1r1a1n1s1f1o1r1m1e1d1 1a1 1s2e1d1y1 1n1e1i1g1h1b1o1r1h2o1d1 1c1a2l1e1d1 1L1o1n1g1a1c1r1e1 1S1q1u1a1r1e1 1i1n1t1o1 1T1i1m1e1s1 1S1q1u1a1r1e1,1 1t1h1a1t1 1h1e1l1p1e1d1 1t1u1r1n1 1a1 1s1i1n1g1l1e1 1s1q1u1a1r1e1 1m1i1l1e1 1s1u2r1o1u1n1d1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1W1a2l1 1S1t1r2e1t1 1s1t1a1t1i1o1n1 1i1n1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1c1e1n1t1e1r1 1o1f1 1g1l1o1b1a1l1 1f1i1n1a1n1c1e1,1 1t1h1a1t1 1m1a1d1e1 1C1o1n1e1y1 1I1s1l1a1n1d1 1a1n1 1a1m1u1s1e1m1e1n1t1 1p1a1r1k1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1m1a2s1e1s1.1 1I1t1 1w1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1s1u1b1w1a1y1 1t1h1a1t1 1f1u1e1l1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1a1s1t1o1n1i1s1h1i1n1g1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1i1c1 1g1r1o1w1t1h1 1t1h1a1t1 1b1u1i1l1t1 1t1h1e1 1c1i1t1y1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1i1c1o1n1i1c1 1s1k1y1s1c1r1a1p1e1r1s1.1 1O1t1h1e1r1 1c1i1t1i1e1s1 1h1a1d1 1s1u1b1w1a1y1s1,1 1b1u1t1 1n1o1n1e1 1t1h1r1e1a1d1e1d1 1t1h1r1o1u1g1h1 1n1e1a1r1l1y1 1a1s1 1m1a1n1y1 1n1e1i1g1h1b1o1r1h2o1d1s1 1a1s1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1‚1Ä1ô1s1,1 1e1n1a1b1l1i1n1g1 1i1t1 1t1o1 1m1o1v1e1 1l1a1r1g1e1 1n1u1m1b1e1r1s1 1o1f1 1w1o1r1k1e1r1s1 1b1e1t1w2e1n1 1M1a1n1h1a2t1a1n1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1m1i2d1l1e1-1c1l1a2s1 1b1o1r1o1u1g1h1s1 1‚1Ä1î1 1a1 1c1y1c1l1e1 1t1h1a1t1 1r1e1p1e1a1t1e1d1 1i1t1s1e1l1f1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1d1a1y1,1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1n1g1 1e1v1e1r1 1m1o1r1e1 1w1e1a1l1t1h1 1a1n1d1 1d1r1a1w1i1n1g1 1i1n1 1e1v1e1r1 1m1o1r1e1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1.
